fields.description: Essential words and expressions for shopping situations.

fields.description: Words for describing symptoms and talking to doctors.

fields.description: Ask for directions and navigate public transport easily.

fields.description: Vocabulary to talk about favorite sports and hobbies.

fields.name: Entertainment
fields.description: Discuss movies, books, and music in conversations.
